positive: The structured report correctly identified some patient demographics like name, gender, date of birth, and address. It also accurately identified some of the medical procedures performed, like gastroscopy, USG, and the fact that biopsies were taken. Several of the medications listed were also present in the ground truth report.
negative: The report is full of hallucinations, which was the biggest issue. The 'Visit Information' section included dates that were not present in the ground truth. Many entries in the 'Wywiad' (medical history) section seem to be fabricated. The report included multiple diagnoses that were not in the ground truth. The 'Zrealizowane procedury' section included procedures that were not listed in the provided document. The recommendations, referrals, and prescriptions were also heavily hallucinated.  Also the report misinterpreted the text and created a large list of prescriptions including some laboratory parameters.
